lead_paragraph: The accident killed 39 people on Oct. 1, 2012. The captain of the second vessel was acquitted of manslaughter but found guilty of endangering the safety of others.

headline.main: Hong Kong Ferry Captain Sentenced to 8 Years in Prison for Deadly Collision
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Ferry Captain Sentenced to 8 Years in Prison for Deadly Collision

snippet: The accident killed 39 people on Oct. 1, 2012. The captain of the second vessel was acquitted of manslaughter but found guilty of endangering the safety of others.
